content: on the knight to do so layer one fringe on top of the next one the diagram above shows three fringes layered where the leftmost fringe is on the bottom and the rightmost one is on the top the needle should go in away from you on the x s and out towards you on the o s the o s should always be going through two fringes this is what the fringe looks like after sewing do not redistribute this pattern or any parts of the pattern you may sell the finished product in small quantities you may not sell custom slots as long as you credit me and link to the pattern attach the fringe to the knight orienting the fringe such that the curls are facing towards the knight pin the fringe to the body so the overlap leaves a gap in the middle of the body then sew the fringe to the bottom of the head where the body meets the head cut oval shapes out of felt for the eyes and attach them to the middle of the face you can either sew or glue it on at this point your knight is complete do not redistribute this pattern or any parts of the pattern you may sell the finished product in small quantities you may not sell custom slots as long as you credit me and link to the pattern
